summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3503, for the improvement of 21st Avenue Northeast, from the alley between Naomi Place (now East 62nd Street) and East 63rd Street to East 61st Street, under Ordinance No. 43374 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
